[docs]class MyDB:
    def __init__(self):
        self.connection = Connection()


[docs]    def connect(self, connection_string):
        return self.connection




[docs]class Connection:
    def __init__(self):
        self.cur = Cursor()


[docs]    def cursor(self):
        return self.cur



[docs]    def close(self):
        pass




[docs]class Cursor:

[docs]    def execute(self, query):
        if query == "select id from employee_db where name=John":
            return 123
        elif query == "select id from employee_db where name=Tom":
            return 789
        else:
            return -1
